author: Norman Longstaff

text:
CO2 at 0.04% is a 2,500th of the atmosphere. That means to warm the climate by just 1"C carbon dioxide molecules must capture 2500"C of heat energy. That is bonkers. It also breaks all the laws of thermodynamics. 

Methane is 0.00017% of the atmosphere so its even more bonkers.

However, the climate is changing. This is because of deliberate geoengineering programmes, in particular ozone thinning away from the poles. Though largely unreported ozone thinning effect is directly observable, this summer you will see a unnaturally bright sun just as we did last year. Under these conditions the pain felt when looking at the sun is not only from the increase in visible light but the much larger increase in infrared. 

Climate change is a programme to force change in accordance with the implementation of Agenda 21 /2030. Current events demonstrate this transition is well underway and will involve massive population cull through injected nanotech (re transhumanist programme). Agenda 21 also sees the permanent loss of all property rights with the introduction of universal basic income (ref NESARA/GESARA) and has/is being promoted by The World Economic Forum. 

'You will own nothing and you will be happy' WEF

In a depopulated world the surviving brainwashed and controlled population will be confined to mega cities. Carbon limits will be used to restrict consumption and liberty. Meanwhile the re-greened wilderness will be the exclusive playground of the ultra rich elite posing as conservationists. 

The CO2 hoax amounts to the theft of the world and the enslavement of humanity by a parasitic few. 

Welcome to the future!

_______

I have included a debunking of 'accumulated heat' as it is so often used to explain how trace elements, so called 'greenhouse gasses', can warm the planet. 

Accumulated heat whilst sounding a reasonable explanation of how heat can build up is rather nothing more than gobbledygook. In fact it shows those using such arguments do not even understand what heat is. 

When we measure temperature we are measuring the heat energy a thing is losing. In short heat is a measurement of flow, the transfer of heat energy and this will always be in the direction towards the colder. For this reason a thing can never 'accumulate heat' in the way those advocating CO2 climate change describe. The temperature of a body is the measure of heat output, it can never be greater than the measure of heat input. Output = input. When a thing is warmed it is heated to an equivalent of the heat input. If this input is not maintained it will cool. Those that propose that heat can build up to be hotter than the total measure of heat input at a given time either do not understand what heat is or are being deliberately misleading. To illustrate, an object being heated by a flame can never become hotter than that flame, it's temperature cannot rise inexorably to the temperature of the sun for instance. Heat cannot be accumulated. When we think about it common sense tells us this must be the case. 

NASA and even Nobel Prize winning physicists have expounded 'accumulated heat' as the explanation how CO2 is able to warm the atmosphere. They claim that over hundreds of years CO2 has captured heat energy and this heat has 'accumulated' to produce a serious warming effect. As I have just explained, this is totally impossible and fundamentally violates all the laws of thermodynamics. That respected scientists should support such uneducated, unthinking nonsense is disturbing and only reflects that in terms of being able to think clearly about a subject they have no facility or inclination. These are the Dark Ages of science. Belief has outweighed logic or any critical thought. It tells us that we should not unquestioningly accept anything we are told, that experts can be fools. 

(NB: be aware of attempts to discard thermodynamics by talking about biology. 
Eg. 'It only takes a drop of arsenic to kill a person.'
This would be somewhat desperate, muddled thinking. Clearly biological processes based on the reaction of a cell are not the same as the laws of physics/thermodynamics). 

Also note there are many other basic contradictions in the CO2 climate hoax (eg that CO2 is highly soluble and is washed out extremely quickly in rainfall; that CO2 levels fluctuate drastically seasonally showing it is not a gas that accumulates; that climate change models deliberately ignore infrared in direct sunlight were they to do so the whole hypothesis falls apart as it means 50% incoming heat energy captured by CO2 will be lost (radiated) back out to space; that the anything that captures energy from direct sunlight will reduce surface temps - this is why clouds immediately reduce surface temps; that the earth loses heat extremely quickly as shown by the fact nights are always colder; that heat cannot be trapped in oceans as described as they are more 'energy dense' than the adjacent air; that increasing biomass increases CO2 because it increases the carbon in cycle; that correlation is not causation; that there is extremely dodgy Victorian science/politics behind Ice Ages which is never questioned or examined - eg mammoths despite claims otherwise are not adapted to cold but rather appear to be cold temperate animals similar to highland cattle, their blood is not antifreeze as claimed, they have no sebaceous glands, hair is long but sparse - even yaks being hairier, mammoth remains as far south as Mexico; that Milankovitch Cycles mean that the Southern Hemisphere is currently in the middle of it's Ice Age; that the hypothesis that burning of forest subsequent to Ice Ages resulted in warming is logically inconsistent as 'no new carbon' has been introduced into cycle this all being carbon already in cycle and in any case would be washed out almost immediately; that CO2 levels are at a geological low; that the oxygen cycle is intertwined with the carbon cycle and dependent on it; that life is carbon based and CO2 is essential; that a halving of CO2 levels would result in the extinction of nearly all plant species - problematic as it in turn means theorised measures of atmospheric CO2 during Ice Ages are unlikely to be correct - contrary there was a proliferation of megafauna; that the so called 'proofs' showing CO2 is able to capture radiant heat energy only prove the opposite and how very minor this is - that atmospheric concentrations of 0.04% CO2 thermal effect would be far too fractional to even be measured; that comparisons to other planets eg Venus/Mars prove CO2 does not capture the proportion of energy claimed and maybe this is why these comparisons are done less and less; that in order to explain vastly higher concentrations of CO2 in the geological past the sun is deemed to have increased its output this despite losing solar mass (gravitational mass) as fuel, this in turn meaning that the orbits of all the planets are all moving away from the sun - such hypothesis where solar activity is used to exactly compensate for holes in the CO2 climate theory is to ignore other evidential explanations of stars such as the 'electric universe theory'; that the geological archive shows periods of millions of years when CO2 and temperature were heading in opposite directions... etc). 

The green industry is extremely big business pushed by the same multinationals involved in fossil fuels. In that respect their so called 'opposition' is a theatrical pretence for public consumption. Indeed if the petrochemical industry wanted to debunk CO2 climate change they could very easily pointing out that such narratives are in direct violation of the established laws of thermodynamics or basic common sense... yet they do not. It should be pointed out that the green agenda is the mainstream - promoted by media and corporate interest, Extinction Rebellion an elaborate Deep State psyop funded by George Soros and founded by Gail Bradbrook a corporate/Deep State stooge who previously liased with the UK cabinet to push 5G with local authorities. 

Green policies are a method to promote 'hyper capitalism', taxes, insane industries (eg electric cars, wind farms, carbon capture etc) and the confiscation of basic freedoms. Dependent on rare earth metals that are incredibly destructive to the environment and polluting these green industries/electric vehicles and energy production actually are far worse than fossil fuels. THERE IS NO SAVING IN CO2 PRODUCTION. Neither are these rare earth materials present in sufficient quantities to mean anything other than rationing of the services associated with their use and necessitate vastly reduced human population (ref Iron Mountain Report, Agenda21, Wildlands Project, WEF Great Reset etc). In short the green revolution/sustainability represents the exact opposite, it is the accelerated trashing of the planet for corporate greed and corporations have been very successful in mobilizing the public behind this scam. 

The carbon hoax is the theft of the world by an hyper wealthy elite who care very little about the environment and see the human race as idiots to be kept in ignorance and contained. 

The damaging effects of green energy were highlighted by Ukcolumn news service on 25th Jan 2021. https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=xmUhZ2Q6Ddo

I am aware that this information will be hard to assimilate. Nobody likes to think they are being duped and led into supporting the destruction of the very things they care about. 

The figures quoted in this comment are all checkable.

text: #Climatechange is real. No one believes in climate change more than me for we all have seen climate change from the three major Ice-ages recorded in history to the subsequent warming periods (which were the Medieval warming period in the Roman warming period). However, Anthropogenic global warming is a complete hoax. Carbon dioxide in the atmosphere has nothing to do with creating global warming.  CO2 Is currently 400 ppm. That is one carbon-dioxide molecule for every 2500 parts of atmosphere. Humans contribute only a scant 16 ppm which is 4% of the total CO2 produced in a year. CO2 only holds heat for a few seconds and there is not enough to drive climate- it is thermodynamically impossible and yet we are told it is true. Lastly, carbon dioxide will increase only after temperatures rise and conversely CO2 levels drop as  temperatures cool.  In other words,  CO2 levels are influenced by heat or the lack there of and therefore does not drive climate but follows climate. #globalwarming #climatechange

 What's amazing to me. I never had a good education. I've never been to colleges or universities. In fact I've never had much schooling at all........... Well  your well educated politicians believe that they can that's why they based their policies on endless growth and call it economic growth. and  the majority of people vote for them so you must think the same thing.

. Every human being on this planet practices that basic law of physics, every single day of their life, that proves that  they cannot endlessly put something into something that is not endless......... text: OK first when Co2 spiked to 390 PPM the temperatures didn't rise because the oceans absorbed the heat and the co2 (not good for them ). So if you did a little research you would have got that. Second yes ice is still there and polar bears are still there, but there is a difference between "there" and "will be there in the future".Just because something exists today it doesn't mean it will in the future. There are 2 white rhinoceroses in the world, that doesn't mean they will be there in the future. About the sea level rise, it's increasing, it's just 2.88mm now, it's going to go up. Lastly yes i agree that the models may be faulty and haven't got much right but just because they may be wrong, it doesn't mean they will be wrong in the future. If you were on the titanic and someone told you that the boat may be heading to the ice berg but they weren't sure, would you try to redirect it. Inaction is always worse.

text:
I like David A. I love his nature documentaries. But he is NOT a god, and many seem to believe. And these are NOT facts, in the assertions of man made climate change. If only people would look at the non climate alarmists, and their documentaries and commentaries AS WELL!! People would get an entirely different picture. 
One fact, scientist who argue that man-made climate change is not a big factor, frequently lose their funding by political governments, and therefore their income. You ONLY get funding if you argue for man-made climate change.  That opens up for world wide psuodo science.
As for using CHILDREN to demonstrate and be the voice. OMG!!! Children are NOT as educated, or wise. They are children, who will listen to the loudest voice, whether the voice is right, or wrong. They need to learn to read and write, then learn objective thinking, which comes with experience and wisdom development. Talk about making an issue emotional, rather than intellectual insight.


Side comment. Oh, what about the polar bears, which was predicted 20 years ago to become extinct. Oh yeah, their population has INCREASED 50% since then. It only took a ban on hunting them, the real real for the initial decline. The alarmists are not advertising that FACT!!   There are soooo many more examples... but now I'm waffling!!

text: Co2 is a green house gas so it does trap heat...... so temperatures are rising. Do research you'll find a bunch of proof that temperatures are rising.
author: Kunal Kashyap

text: @Kunal Kashyap    Define “green house gas”.  Claiming CO2 is a “green house Gas” is a presumption that it actually causes warming.  I do not agree that the data shows temperatures have risen at all in the past 20 years, but even if they have, there is zero evidence that CO2 makes any measurable difference.  Then you ignored every other point.
author: Alan Beasy
Kunal Kashyap

text:
@Kunal Kashyap    Okay.  This is the sort of ignorance that feeds the stupidity of climate alarmism.  What you wrote is meaningless crap that tells me you don’t understand a thing about physics and you just repeat other crap from people who also understand nothing.

You wrote: “........ traps and radiates infrared radiations of long wave length....”

1. Infrared radiation (IR) is one frequency band in the whole electromagnetic spectrum. IR is called “long wave” because it has a lower frequency than visible light. Heat gets trapped in a glass house because high frequency (short wave) UV radiation from the sun can pass through glass.  UV is absorbed by soil, plants and water in the glasshouse.... which warms them.  They re radiate heat as IR, but that heat cannot escape because it is long wave radiation cannot pass through glass.
2. CO2 is not a glass lid over the earth. CO2 does not “trap” IR.  
3. CO2 absorbs IR, but can only absorb a small part of the IR spectrum it receives.
4. CO2 has a very low heat capacity.....which means it quickly reaches full capacity.  Once it reaches full capacity, everything that is received is reradiated and passes by on its journey into space.  This is called equilibrium - CO2 retains IR for only about 0.0001 Seconds.
5. Some molecules can absorb more heat than others.                                     (The number of atoms has nothing to do with it.)                                          CO2 and H2O both have three atoms, but the heat capacity of water vapour is 1.996 kJ/kgK while CO2 is only 0.844 kJ/ kg K
6. With 1% to 4% of water vapour in the atmosphere compared to 0.04% of CO2, water vapour has between 50 to 200 times the heat absorption capacity of CO2 in the atmosphere.....which is the major factor for retaining sufficient warmth necessary to maintain life close to the surface of the earth.
7. Without water vapour storing some heat energy, all the IR radiation would escape too quickly through the transparent atmosphere (99% nitrogen and oxygen).  We sense water vapour as *humidity*.
8. The storage of this heat energy is essential for driving the convection currents that produce our weather patterns and for the viability of life.
9. The major role of CO2 in the carbon cycle is providing plant food.....absorbing heat is minuscule and insignificant.
10. The reason air is hot near the surface of the earth is always because the earth is heating the air above it.  But CO2 is not stopping the heat escaping.  The temperature drops about 6.5 degrees every kilometre up.  So on any day where the temperature is 40 degrees at ground level it will be zero freezing point just 6km up..... but up beyond that, it is generally the same temperature globally.  Commercial air craft fly in -30 to -60 degrees only 10km up.... the death zone..... only the height of Mt Everest.


Water vapour and CO2 are *gases*.......a gas is not a solid - so it cannot be a lid.....  and even if it was, it covers less than 1% of the roof area.

You do not need to be a brilliant scientist to understand that.

* Each molecule of CO2 is surrounded by over 2400 molecules of non-heat trapping nitrogen, oxygen and argon, making it impossible to form a ‘blanket’ as you are told - especially at high altitudes where wind speeds can reach 200 mph.
* Did you know that in commercial green houses, they pump in extra CO2 to make the plants grow faster? (2000ppm) They do not open the roof of the glass house because they KNOW the CO2 will not trap heat.......the heat AND the CO2 will escape within minutes.
* If you take away only a few sheets of glass from a green house, 100% of the warm air will escape. What chance if 50% of the glass was removed?   

So if CO2 is said to be like the glass roof of a green house, 99.96% of the glass is missing. (because CO2 is only 0.04% of the atmosphere.)

There is no "trapping" of heat at all.

————————————-
Finally:
Do you have any idea of how much CO2 humans produce?

* The IPCC agrees that annual human inflow of CO2 to the atmosphere is 4.6ppm and natural CO2 inflow is 98ppm.....  ie 4.5% vs 95.5%

This inflow is recycled continually otherwise CO2 would have risen to over 1,200 ppm in the past 10 years.

* The increase in CO2 since 1750 is from 280ppm to 410ppm.
That is 130 increase in 260 years.

It is impossible for human CO2 to be responsible for all this this increase because there is no difference between human CO2 and natural CO2

* Using IPCC annual inflow figures above, natural CO2 inflow has caused 95.5% of the 130ppm increase = 124ppm.
* Human CO2 inflow has caused 4.5% of the 130ppm increase = 5.85ppm.

* The increase since 1750 is 32% of the current total.
* Human CO2 inflow has resulted in 1%.  (6 ppm)
* Natural CO2 inflow has resulted in 31% (124 ppm)

———————————-
Another way of looking at the same question:

* Natural CO2 production is 3,560 GT per year
* Human production is only        36GT per year

So 98.9% of CO2 is natural, while 1.1% is human.

 ————————————
Therefore in summary:
1. CO2 cannot trap heat
2. There is not enough even if it could (only 0.041% of atmosphere)
3. Humans have contributed only 1.1% of that 0.041%
4. 1.1% of 0.041% = about 0.00045% of atmosphere (0.0000045)
——————————-

It is insane ignorance or deliberate deception if any “scientists” claim that CO2 is the cause of any climate changing.
author: Alan Beasy

text: @DERMOT HENRY  You have a point about the correlation between temperature and CO2. But I'd like to share a little bit of science on the subject. It takes the CO2 about 10 years to have any effect on the climate. So you should compare current °C with CO2 data from 2008. However, this does not apply to CH4, SO4, H2O. - Drink plan noted. You never know ;-) I've never been to Ireland, but it nurtured Spike Milligan (okay, I know, he's born in India) and Dave Allen, so it can't be a bad idea to visit the place.
author: JZ's Best Friend

text: @JZ's Best Friend  I disagree with your time scale there there is a few hundred years of a time lag between c02 being released  from the oceans  and it doesn't affect  the temp so no thanks for the science lesson
author: DERMOT HENRY

text: @DERMOT HENRY  Did I mention 'oceans' somewhere? Whatever, If there's no CC for you, then there's no CC for you. If there's CC for me, then there's CC for me. This is such a pointless discussion: if the place heats up, then we all die; if it doessn't, well then we all die regardless, albeit a bit later. ps: The stuff released from the ocean, and having a fast effect, is more likely to be CH4, but who cares? - psps: time scale is not mine, it's from people who are a whole lot smarter than I am.

text:
You can call it propaganda if the information is biased or wrong. But it isn't, unless you are a climate change denier or have money in the fossil fuel industry.

Here are evidences provided by NASA: https://climate.nasa.gov/evidence/

UN reports: https://www.un.org/en/sections/issues-depth/climate-change/

UN mass extinction report: https://www.un.org/sustainabledevelopment/blog/2019/05/nature-decline-unprecedented-report/

You could choose to cry all of the above as false, but then we are not having an intellectual debate, just a bigoted argument.
author: The Conclave

text: @The Conclave  why do you continually call people "climate change deniers"? we dont deny the climate changes, it always has, we need proof of the warming, and over the last 50 years, it has not warmed, do your own research, like i said before, we are in a grand solar minimum, our sun is going to sleep, it does this every 200-400 years, its a cycle and it always happens, prepare now , or you will be in serious trouble, in prepare now, i mean, build a greenhouse, save seeds and can food
